note.p: Birth: Heaton Norris, Lancashire, England (29 December 1803)
Death: His home, Redcliffe Gardens, South Kensington, London (07 February 1879)
Career: Superintendent, Great Seal Patent Office; Professor of Machinery, University College, London
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1879 vol 29 pp xxxii-xxxiv
Notes: Joshua Field signed under General Knowledge, but this crossed out
